attributes.description:
Approved dealer by ABSA, Wesbank, Standard Bank, MFC, Nedbank.
2022 Toyota Land Cruiser 79 4.5D V8 LX Single Cab.
Only 60km.
New, Full balance of factory warranty, Spare keys, Perfectly equipt!
Extras: Old Man Emu suspension, ARB offroad front bumper with foglights, HARDKORR LED spotlights, T-Max winch, Tralies(Cattle rails), Rubberised bin with double sidewalls, Towbar, Outback 4x4 roofconsole with LED, Beesdam Legacy seatcovers, Radio with bluetooth, USB and remote, Shackels, 5 x BF Goodrich tyres!
Also: Aircon, Central locking, Alarm, Elec windows, 4x4, Low range, Dual diff-lock, ABS, Airbags, 12V Outlet, Snorkel, Sidesteps, Mags.
New, perfect and pristine condition!
R 1 029 900
#toyota #landcruiser
